patient_info: Cardiomegaly,Dyspnea,Abdominal distention,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Myocarditis,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF)
2. Dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM)
3. Restrictive cardiomyopathy (RCM)
4. Infiltrative cardiomyopathies (e.g., Anderson-Fabry disease, amyloidosis)
5. Viral myocarditis
6. Autoimmune myocarditis
7. Endocrine cardiomyopathy (e.g., thyroid disease, diabetes)
8. Hemochromatosis
9. Pompe disease (Glycogen storage disease type II)
10. Loeffler's endocarditis or eosinophilic myocarditis
